attributes.action: Stop basing the economy of the UK on the housing market and massive personal debt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Personal debt in the UK as of the end of July 2007 stood at 1,355 Billion pounds. Most of this is accounted for by mortgages on artificially inflated house prices. We cannot go on using the housing market and debt to bouy up the economy just to keep the UK out of a recession. This situation is a disaster waiting to happen. Stop this madness now.
